libraries.name: LiquidCrystal
libraries.author: Arduino, Adafruit
libraries.sentence: Allows communication with alphanumerical liquid crystal displays (LCDs). For all Arduino boards.
libraries.paragraph: This library allows an Arduino board to control LiquidCrystal displays (LCDs) based on the Hitachi HD44780 (or a compatible) chipset, which is found on most text-based LCDs. The library works with in either 4 or 8 bit mode (i.e. using 4 or 8 data lines in addition to the rs, enable, and, optionally, the rw control lines).

libraries.name: Scheduler
libraries.author: Arduino
libraries.sentence: Allows multiple tasks to run at the same time, without interrupting each other. For Arduino DUE only.
libraries.paragraph: The Scheduler library enables the Arduino Due to run multiple functions at the same time. This allows tasks to happen without interrupting each other.</br>This is a cooperative scheduler in that the CPU switches from one task to another. The library includes methods for passing control between tasks.

libraries.name: Servo

libraries.name: WiFi

libraries.paragraph: The capacitiveSensor library turns two or more Arduino pins into a capacitive sensor, which can sense the electrical capacitance of the human body. At its most sensitive, the sensor will start to sense a hand or body inches away from the sensor.

libraries.name: MAX78630
libraries.author: Gunce Akkoyun <gunce.akkoyun@lvx.com.tr>, Alp Erkan Savli <alp.erkan@lvx.com.tr>
libraries.sentence: Enables reading polyphase energy-monitor parameters of MAX78630 (X2Bus EnergyBoard)
libraries.paragraph: The EnergyBoard is an energy measurement module for polyphase power-monitoring systems. It is designed for real-time monitoring for a variety of typical three-phase configurations in industrial applications. The EnergyBoard provides up to six analog inputs for interfacing to voltage and current sensors. Scaled voltages from the sensors are fed to the single converter front-end using a high-resolution delta-sigma converter. Supported current sensors include current transformers (CTs), Rogowski coils, and resistive shunts.

libraries.sentence: Code to assist with running MINDSi robots
libraries.paragraph: This library contains code for running all the sensors sold with MINDSi kits, and examples for each chassis

libraries.name: Pushetta
libraries.author: Fabrizio Guglielmino <guglielmino@gumino.com>
libraries.sentence: The library to use Pushetta service, a service to push notifications to mobile phones and other devices
libraries.paragraph: Pushetta is a Web API that provides an unificated way to send realtime notifications to multiple devices. Used with Arduino Yun it's possible to send alert, informations or any data in realtime to groups of subscribers (more on pushetta web site)

libraries.name: FTOLED
libraries.author: Angus Gratton <angus@freetronics.com>
libraries.sentence: Library to drive Freetronics OLED128 128x128 display.
libraries.paragraph: Supports graphics operations (test, images, etc.) on the OLED128. Can probably be used with other SSD1351 based displays. Manual at https://github.com/freetronics/FTOLED/wiki

libraries.name: FTOLED
libraries.author: Angus Gratton <angus@freetronics.com>
libraries.sentence: Library to drive Freetronics OLED128 128x128 display.
libraries.paragraph: Supports graphics operations (test, images, etc.) on the OLED128. Can probably be used with other SSD1351 based displays. Manual at https://github.com/freetronics/FTOLED/wiki

libraries.name: FTRGBLED
libraries.author: Angus Gratton <angus@freetronics.com>
libraries.sentence: Freetronics RGBLED module (WS2801-based) driver library.
libraries.paragraph: Display RGB colours on a chain of WS2801-based Freetronics RGBLEDs (or compatible).

libraries.name: DMD2
libraries.author: Angus Gratton <angus@freetronics.com>
libraries.sentence: Updated (beta) library for Freetronics DMD dot matrix displays.
libraries.paragraph: Supports graphics operations (test, images, etc.) Still experimental, the stable library is called called "DMD"

libraries.name: BaroLibrary
libraries.author: Angus Gratton <angus@freetronics.com>
libraries.sentence: Library for Measurement Specialties MS5637-02BA03 Altimeter/Pressure sensor (including Freetronics BARO module).

libraries.name: SoftwareWire
libraries.author: Testato, Koepel
libraries.sentence: Creates a software I2C/TWI bus on every pins.
libraries.paragraph: The SoftwareWire is only I2C Master mode. More than one software I2C bus can be created. The clock pulse stretching is implemented, so the Slave can be another Arduino board

libraries.name: PID
libraries.author: Brett Beauregard
libraries.sentence: PID controller
libraries.paragraph: A PID controller seeks to keep some input variable close to a desired setpoint by adjusting an output. The way in which it does this can be 'tuned' by adjusting three parameters (P,I,D).

libraries.name: DCF77
libraries.author: Thijs Elenbaas
libraries.sentence: Read and decode the atomic time broadcasted by the DCF77 radiostation.
libraries.paragraph: The DCF77 library has been designed to work in conjunction with Arduino Time library and allows a sketch to get the precise CET time and date as a standard C time_t. PLEASE NOTE: samples require Time and TimeZone libraries.

libraries.name: EEPROMEx
libraries.author: Thijs Elenbaas
libraries.sentence: Extension of the standard Arduino EEPROM library.
libraries.paragraph: Extended for reading and writing basic types, structs, strings, arrays and more.

libraries.name: CmdMessenger
libraries.author: Thijs Elenbaas, Valeriy Kucherenko
libraries.sentence: A serial messaging library for the Arduino and .NET/Mono platform.
libraries.paragraph: It uses serial port and Bluetooth as transport layer. To use CmdMessenger, we define a list of command identifiers, then attach callback / handler functions for received messages. PLEASE NOTE: samples requires PID and optionally Adafruit_MAX31855 libraries.

libraries.name: OneSheeld
libraries.author: Integreight, Inc. <info@integreight.com>
libraries.maintainer: Eslam Ali <eali@integreight.com>, Islam Mustafa <islam@integreight.com>, Mustafa Fayez <mustafa@integreight.com>
libraries.sentence: It allows you to control your 1Sheeld(s).
libraries.paragraph: 1Sheeld is an All-In-One Arduino shield that lets you use your smartphone capabilites (Sensors, Internet,...etc) to power your Arduino projects.

libraries.name: BLEPeripheral
libraries.author: Sandeep Mistry <sandeep.mistry@gmail.com>
libraries.sentence: An Arduino library for creating custom BLE peripherals.
libraries.paragraph: Supports nRF8001 and nRF51822 based boards/shields

libraries.name: BLEPeripheral
libraries.author: Sandeep Mistry <sandeep.mistry@gmail.com>
libraries.sentence: An Arduino library for creating custom BLE peripherals.
libraries.paragraph: Supports nRF8001 and nRF51822 based boards/shields

libraries.name: Radio
libraries.author: Matthias Hertel
libraries.sentence: Library for controlling FM radio receiver chips.
libraries.paragraph: This library implements the functions to control the FM radio receiver chips TEA5767, RDA5807M, SI4703, SI4705 to build a FM radio receiver. The library unifies the functions for all the chips so they may be swapped on demand.

libraries.name: PCD8544
libraries.author: Carlos Rodrigues
libraries.sentence: Philips PCD8544 or compatible LCD library.
libraries.paragraph: PCD8544 supports monochrome LCDs most commonly found on old Nokia phones. This is a minimal library intended for low memory usage.

libraries.name: PCD8544
libraries.author: Carlos Rodrigues
libraries.sentence: Philips PCD8544 or compatible LCD library.
libraries.paragraph: PCD8544 supports monochrome LCDs most commonly found on old Nokia phones. This is a minimal library intended for low memory usage.

libraries.name: MagStripe
libraries.author: Carlos Rodrigues
libraries.sentence: Decode data from TTL (raw) magnetic card readers.
libraries.paragraph: MagStripe supports decoding any of the three tracks from standard magnetic stripe cards using a TTL (raw) card reader.

libraries.name: ArduinoUnit
libraries.author: Matthew Murdoch
libraries.sentence: Unit test framework for arduino projects.
libraries.paragraph: ArduinoUnit is a unit testing framework for Arduino libraries.

libraries.name: SPIFlash
libraries.author: Marzogh
libraries.sentence: Winbond W25Q80BV SPI flash library for Arduino
libraries.paragraph: Winbond W25Q80BV SPI flash library for Arduino

libraries.name: SPIFlash
libraries.author: Prajwal Bhattaram
libraries.sentence: Winbond W25Q80BV SPI flash library for Arduino.
libraries.paragraph: In its current form the library enables reading and writing bytes from and to various locations, reading and writing pages, sector, block and chip erase, powering down for low power operation and continuous read functions.

libraries.name: AMIS30543
libraries.author: Pololu
libraries.sentence: AMIS-30543 SPI stepper motor driver library
libraries.paragraph: This is a library for the Arduino IDE that helps use the SPI interface of the AMIS-30543 micro-stepping stepper motor driver.

libraries.name: AMIS30543

libraries.sentence: AMIS-30543 SPI stepper motor driver library
libraries.paragraph: This is a library for the Arduino IDE that helps use the SPI interface of the AMIS-30543 micro-stepping stepper motor driver.

libraries.author: Doc Walker <4-20ma@wvfans.net>
libraries.sentence: ModbusMaster
libraries.paragraph: Enables communication with Modbus slaves over RS232/485 (via RTU protocol).

libraries.name: ModbusMaster
libraries.author: Doc Walker
libraries.sentence: Enlighten your Arduino to be a Modbus master.
libraries.paragraph: Enables communication with Modbus slaves over RS232/485 (via RTU protocol). Requires a RS232/485 transceiver.

libraries.name: ModbusMaster
libraries.author: Doc Walker
libraries.sentence: Enlighten your Arduino to be a Modbus master.
libraries.paragraph: Enables communication with Modbus slaves over RS232/485 (via RTU protocol). Requires an RS232/485 transceiver.

libraries.name: PinChangeInterrupt
libraries.author: NicoHood
libraries.sentence: A simple & compact PinChangeInterrupt library for Arduino.
libraries.paragraph: PinChangeInterrupt library with a resource friendly implementation (API and LowLevel). PinChangeInterrupts are different than normal Interrupts. See readme for more information.

libraries.name: RBL_nRF8001
libraries.author: Cheong
libraries.sentence: An Arduino library for the nRF8001 products such as the BLE Shield and Blend.
libraries.paragraph: Providing a simple service (TxRx) for exchanging data between nRF8001 and BLE Central (e.g. iPhone 6), this library requires Nordic BLE SDK for Arduino to function, please also install that library.

libraries.name: BLE SDK for Arduino
libraries.author: RedBearLab
libraries.sentence: Nordic BLE SDK for Arduino for nRF8001 products such as the BLE Shield, Blend and Blend Micro.
libraries.paragraph: Provides a library and a lot of tutorials/examples for developing BLE application using Nordic nRF8001 BLE connectivity chip for Arduino.

libraries.name: GPRSbee
libraries.author: keestux,SODAQ
libraries.sentence: An Arduino library for the SODAQ GPRSbee.
libraries.paragraph: It supports sending HTTP GET and POST, send data via FTP, and more.

libraries.name: Tsunami
libraries.author: Nick Johnson <nick@arachnidlabs.com>
libraries.sentence: Library for interfacing with the Tsunami's hardware peripherals.
libraries.paragraph: Provides an easy to use API for programming the Tsunami.

libraries.name: EasyVR
libraries.author: RoboTech-srl <software@robotechsrl.com>
libraries.sentence: A library for the EasyVR line of products.
libraries.paragraph: It implements the EasyVR communication protocol over any Arduino Serial port and a special Bridge mode for direct connection to the EasyVR Commander software running on a PC.
